text: The Basilica–Cathedral of Our Lady of the Pillar () is a Roman Catholic church in Zaragoza, Aragon, Spain. The Basilica venerates Blessed Virgin Mary, under her title of “Our Lady of the Pillar”. This church is the first church dedicated to Mary. This building is one of the 12 Treasures of Spain. title: Cathedral-Basilica of Our Lady of the Pillar
